short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Matte Unique allows you to set the matte color as background in new tab & search the web from popular search engines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Installing this extension will replace your browsers new tab with simple matte color theme and allow you to search from your preferable search engine. 

- Simple Matte color in background
- Watch with HH:MM:SS format
- Search Engine Selection (Google, Bing, Yahoo, Yandex, Baidu)
- Motivational Quotes

By clicking ‘Add to Chrome’, you accept and agree to installing the Matte Unique extension.
